headline: Apollo Commercial REIT Sells $9B Book to Insurance Arm
summary: A property lender managed by Apollo Global Management agreed to sell its portfolio to the buyout firm's insurance arm after the publicly listed real estate investment trust consistently traded below its book value. Bloomberg's Patrick Clark discusses the story on 'Bloomberg Markets' with Scarlet Fu.

raw.headline: Apollo Commercial REIT Sells $9B Book to Insurance Arm

headline: Retirees Are Collecting 9.5% Monthly From An Overlooked Preferred Stock Fund
summary: The Virtus InfraCap U.S. Preferred Stock ETF (NYSEARCA:PFFA) delivers a 9.5% yield, but many retirees are missing it. How PFFA Generates Its Yield PFFA holds a diversified portfolio of 188 preferred securities issued by corporations. These preferred stocks function as a hybrid between bonds and common equity, with companies issuing them at fixed dividend rates ... Retirees Are Collecting 9.5% Monthly From An Overlooked Preferred Stock Fund

headline: KKR enters $1.4bn deal to sell Goodpack stake back to founding family – report
summary: KKR’s decision to divest comes after it explored options for selling the reusable bulk container provider in October 2024.

raw.headline: KKR enters $1.4bn deal to sell Goodpack stake back to founding family – report
